text:
A great drinking venue suitable for both families and singles. The friendly foreign staff are dedicated to ensuring you leave satisfied.

Let your wife and kids enjoy themselves here while you take a moment to relax and unwind. A guaranteed good time awaits!
I had Heineken Tub of 6 bottles at around 12:30 at night and had good rest and refresh myself for next day job
The serving staff Kim is very attentive. She ensure your drinks are always chill. And re-order are delivered promptly
Accidentally left my card there, I believe the cashier used my cards to purchase 10-20 towers beer, the police said they can't do anything. It is a scam pub. Be careful!

Overall friendly & humble staff. They will company & talk to you if you tip them. Tips requirement are much lower than other pubs in SG, so no complain at all! The Draft beer in joo chiat pub are abit diluted.
